attributes.action: Create a law stating that all rented accomodation meets the highest energy efficiency standards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the recent government incentives for homeowners to make their homes more energy efficient, it is those in rented accomodation, mainly single people, who lose out, as they is very little they can do themselves to save energy. I propose that ALL landlords be encouraged to maintain the maximum grade of energy efficiency on all properties they own to assist those who live there and reduce the impact on the environment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
